name: VGS Collect.js and Stripe 3DS Flow Demo

VGS_PROXY.description: full url with credential of the vgs proxy returned by the dashboard

VGS_PROXY_CERTIFICATE_B64.description: vgs proxy certificate encode in a  base64 long string

PUBLIC_URL.description: the public url of the server without `/` at the end, https://{app-name}.herokuapp.com
